Package doa.engine.graphics

Class DoaSprites

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.graphics.DoaSprites
public final class DoaSprites extends Object
Responsible for providing a Factory to create sprites for DoaEngine to display. This class is static, therefore has no objects.
Since:
DoaEngine 1.1
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static Map<String,​BufferedImage>
    ORIGINAL_SPRITES
    Collection that maps sprite names to sprites.
    static Map<String,​BufferedImage>
    SHADED_SPRITES
    Collection that maps sprite names to sprites that are shaded according to the lights the scene has.

  • Field Details

    • ORIGINAL_SPRITES

      public static final Map<String,​BufferedImage> ORIGINAL_SPRITES
      Collection that maps sprite names to sprites.

    • SHADED_SPRITES

      public static final Map<String,​BufferedImage> SHADED_SPRITES
      Collection that maps sprite names to sprites that are shaded according to the lights the scene has.

  • Method Details

    • createSprite

      public static BufferedImage createSprite​(@NotNull @NotNull String spriteName, @NotNull @NotNull String spriteFile) throws IOException
      Creates a sprite, adds the created sprite to ORIGINAL_SPRITES, and returns the newly created sprite.
      Parameters:
      spriteName - unique name of the sprite that will be created
      spriteFile - path to the sprite on the disk
      Returns:
      the newly created sprite in ORIGINAL_SPRITES whose name is spriteName
      Throws:
      IOException - if sprite cannot be loaded by DoaEngine

    • createSpriteFromSpriteSheet

      public static BufferedImage createSpriteFromSpriteSheet​(@NotNull @NotNull String spriteName, @NotNull @NotNull String spriteFile, @NotNull @NotNull Rectangle boundaries) throws IOException
      Creates a sprite from a sprite-sheet by cropping the sprite-sheet using the boundaries parameter, adds the created sprite to ORIGINAL_SPRITES, and returns the newly created sprite.
      Parameters:
      spriteName - unique name of the sprite that will be created
      spriteFile - path to the sprite-sheet from which the new sprite will be cropped from
      boundaries - bounding box of the sprite inside the sprite-sheet, i.e. where the sprite is inside the sprite-sheet
      Returns:
      the newly created sprite in ORIGINAL_SPRITES whose name is spriteName
      Throws:
      IOException - if sprite-sheet cannot be loaded by DoaEngine

    • getSprite

      public static BufferedImage getSprite​(@NotNull @NotNull String spriteName)
      Conveniency method. This method exists solely to reduce the amount of typing required while trying to retrieve a sprite from DoaSprites class. Calling this method is equivalent to calling: DoaSprites.SHADED_SPRITES.get(spriteName);
      Parameters:
      spriteName - name of the sprite that is trying to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the sprite in SHADED_SPRITES whose name is spriteName

    • deepCopyDoaSprite

      public static BufferedImage deepCopyDoaSprite​(@NotNull @NotNull BufferedImage sprite)
      Deep copies a DoaSprite
      Parameters:
      sprite - DoaSprite to deep copy
      Returns:
      the deep copy of the passed DoaSprites

    • scale

      public static BufferedImage scale​(@NotNull @NotNull BufferedImage sprite, int width, int height)
      Creates a scaled version of a DoaSprite.A new DoaSprite will be returned as a result of this call. The returned sprite is not stored neither in ORIGINAL_SPRITES, nor SHADED_SPRITES.
      Parameters:
      sprite - DoaSprite to scale
      width - width of the scaled DoaSprite
      height - height of the scaled DoaSprite
      Returns:
      the scaled instance of the passed DoaSprite
